articles.author: Damian Carrington
articles.title: Fossil fuels being subsidised at rate of $13m a minute, says IMF - The Guardian
articles.description: Oil, gas and coal benefited from $7tn in support in 2022 despite being primary cause of climate crisis
articles.content:
Fossil fuels benefited from record subsidies of $13m (£10.3m) a minute in 2022, according to the International Monetary Fund, despite being the primary cause of the climate crisis.
The IMF analysis … [+4323 chars]

articles.description: TTF futures fall after unions agree deal with Woodside to ease concerns about global supply squeeze
